data.prayer: Please, convict the 1,799 believers in Ar Raqqah, Syria to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ar Raqqah, Syria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Ar Raqqah, Syria need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Ar Raqqah to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Ar Raqqah, Syria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, North Iraqi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, North Iraqi people.
Father, bring yourself glory in Ar Raqqah. Through your servants plant 188 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Ar Raqqah, Syria to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ar Raqqah, Syria has a population of 944,000.

We estimate Ar Raqqah has 1,799 people who might know Jesus, 52,203 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 889,999 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 524 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ar Raqqah. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
